iPhone.InfoAdditions:
<key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>Provision of access to geolocation will allow you to share your current location with friends nearby.</string>
<key>NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription</key> <string>Provision of access to geolocation will allow you to share your current location with friends nearby.</string>
<key>UIViewControllerBasedStatusBarAppearance</key> <string>NO</string>
<key>UIStatusBarStyle</key> <string>UIStatusBarStyleDarkContent</string>
<key>UIUserInterfaceStyle</key> <string>Light</string>
<key>UIRequiresPersistentWiFi</key> <string>NO</string>
<key>NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription</key> <string>Provision of access to gallery will allow you to share your photos and videos in chats with your friends.</string>
<key>NSContactsUsageDescription</key> <string>Phone numbers of your contacts will be transferred to our servers to find your friends. For additional information please read our privacy policy.</string>
<key>NSCameraUsageDescription</key> <string>Provision of access to camera will allow you to make video calls, take pictures and share them in chats with your friends.</string>
<key>NSMicrophoneUsageDescription</key> <string>Provision of access to microphone will allow you to make audio calls, record audio messages and share them in chats with your friends.</string>
<key>NSFaceIDUsageDescription</key> <string>Face ID is used to protect your account password</string>
<key>UIDeviceFamily</key> <array> <string>1</string> </array>
<key>MinimumOSVersion</key> <string>13.0</string>
<key>CFBundleURLTypes</key> <array> <dict> <key>CFBundleURLName</key> <string>com.iswfx.connect</string> <key>CFBundleURLSchemes</key> <array> <string>dukascopy</string> </array> </dict> </array>
<key>LSApplicationQueriesSchemes</key> <array> <string>com.dukascopy.community</string> <string>com.dukascopy.iplatform</string> </array>
<key>Fabric</key> <dict> <key>APIKey</key> <string>6d81b5f368a32de5772b247444a55d90d568b566</string> <key>Kits</key> <array> <dict> <key>KitInfo</key> <dict/> <key>KitName</key> <string>Crashlytics</string> </dict> </array> </dict>
